thread.title: Susan S
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Susan S

author: Susan S
title: Susan S
text: I have four drivers in my family. We all buy all of our tires from Town Fair. I am a single mom who knows nothing about cars or tires, and I know when I go to Town Fair that I am getting the best price (they price match) and---equally important----that I am getting the absolute best advice I can get about what to spend my money on. We have never had anything but EXCEPTIONAL experiences at Town Fair. Today we saw A.J, who was wonderfully helpful, unhurried, kind, and smart.
